# noi-icon



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

(INTERNAL) render an icon.

Icons are embedded inside the component (so far).

Icon size can be changed by 'font-size' style

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `name`   | `name`    | icon name   | `string` | `undefined` |


## Dependencies

### Used by

 - [noi-a22-traffic-forecast](../../a22-traffic-forecast)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  noi-a22-traffic-forecast --> noi-icon
  style noi-icon fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
```
